discourse_list.title: Vyper.fun: CryptoZombies-like interactive learning resource for Vyper

content.content: Hey everyone! Recently I started learning/exploring Vyper. As the Vyper community is still growing, we can benefit from some interactive learning resources. A famous learning resource for solidity which has trained a lot of solidity developers is Cryptozombies. So, it would be a good idea to have a similar resource for Vyper. Hence I started https://vyper.fun. I’m looking for:  Contributors  Suggestions on Chapter topics. Right now my plan is to start with a Pokemon game: collect, breed, upgrade, battle, and trade pokemon.
You can also hop on our gitter.
